example.code:
PS C:\>$results = Get-IAMGroup -GroupName "Testers" PS C:\>$results
Group IsTruncated Marker Users ----- ----------- ------ ----- Amazon.IdentityManagement.Model.Group False {Theresa, David}
PS C:\>$results.Group
Arn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:group/Testers CreateDate : 12/10/2014 3:39:11 PM GroupId : 3RHNZZGQJ7QHMAEXAMPLE1 GroupName : Testers Path : /
PS C:\>$results.Users
Arn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/Theresa CreateDate : 12/10/2014 3:39:27 PM PasswordLastUsed : 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM Path : / UserId : 4OSVDDJJTF4XEEXAMPLE2 UserName : Theresa
Arn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/David CreateDate : 12/10/2014 3:39:27 PM PasswordLastUsed : 3/19/2015 8:44:04 AM Path : / UserId : Y4FKWQCXTA52QEXAMPLE3 UserName : David
example.description: This example returns details about the IAM group Testers, including a collection of all the IAM users that belong to the group.
